sense.name: chair
sense.commentary: chairperson, chairman, chairwoman, prexy - the executive officer of a firm, corporation, or university
sense.examples: The president realized that the company was going bankrupt.

sense.name: head of a country
sense.commentary: the chief executive of a republic
sense.examples: After the exportation of Captain Hook, Peter Pan was elected President of Neverland. Canaan Banana was Zimbabwe's first black president.

sense.name: head of U.S.
sense.commentary: President of the United States, United States President, President, Chief Executive - the office of the United States head of state
sense.examples: A President is elected every four years. The President likes to job every morning.
